About Me

Hi, I'm Yixuan. Born in China 🇨🇳, I've lived and studied in the UK 🇬🇧 and Germany 🇩🇪, and now I'm based in Zurich, Switzerland 🇨🇭. I'm passionate about technology—from Natural Language Processing to web development and 3D modeling. I've taught myself tools like Blender, Astro, and Three.js, and I'm always excited to learn more.

When I'm not coding, I love traveling 🛥️, cycling 🚴🏻‍♀️, playing badminton 🏸, and catching Pokémons :P I enjoy meeting new people, exploring new places, and taking on challenges that push me to grow. For me, life's all about turning “I can't” into “I did.” ✨

Let's connect and create something amazing together!
